name: Ultimate CARnage
description:
How fast can you drive ?  Can you beat me?

Ultimate CARnage is an early stage racing game that features some of the best racing tracks that you can drive on with AI enemies, trying to beat you in every way possible. Drift, defeat other drivers, get a good BLT score and most importantly, be FAST!

FEATURES

  • Ultimate hard racing tracks 
  • Completely insane fast and brutal AI drivers
  • You can jump of some cliffs! That's definitely a feature!
  • Fun included
  • Finally a Main Menu with a pause option!

GAME LENGTH

  • Varies from track to track

CONTROLS

Forwards - W

Backwards - S

Left - A

Right - D

Hold the option key when opening to change settings

FINAL NOTES

This game is currently being developed and not in it's final stage. Please wait a bit until I'm done and support me.

GOOD LUCK AND HAVE FUN

And please report any glitches and bugs, if you find any.
